glsa.title: Gallery: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: The WebDAV and Reupload modules of Gallery contain multiple unspecified vulnerabilities.

background.p: Gallery is a PHP based photo album manager.

description.p: Merrick Manalastas and Nicklous Roberts have discovered multiple vulnerabilities in the WebDAV and Reupload modules.

impact.p: A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to bypass security restrictions and rename, replace and change properties of items, or edit item data using WebDAV.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Gallery users should upgrade to the latest version:
